name: RC
description:
NOTE: GAME WILL START STRAIGHT AWAY

(Made for ACM Winter Game Jam 2021 in 4 days,  unfortunately I didn't get to submit it in time ;w;)

Cars are notoriously difficult to handle, especially in the wintertime. What happens when Imogen gets an RC car and has to prove herself with her driving skills on ice?

Meet new characters and show them your technique!
